analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca hetu sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na avitakka vicāra mattam dhammam paṭicca hetu avitakka vicāra mattaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naavitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na avitakka avicāram dhammam paṭicca na hetu avitakka avicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
